Sections.Text: The Bosch Estate, 1909. Trapped in the halls beneath the manse, Cornelius Bosch's final experiment lies in wait, locked behind mystic wards.
You took a risk breaking Bosch's wards when you entered the cellars. Now an arcane rift has opened.
If The Thing Bosch was creating seizes the rift before you do, it will become unimaginably powerful.
But if you can control the rift's energies and deactivate the golem first, then all Bosch's secrets will be yours.
